entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Risk of freezing rain in the evening. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
